basics.name: Albert Blasco Clariana
basics.label: Web developer
basics.summary:
I am a passionate Web Developer with over 8 years of experience, currently focused on a front-end role. As a such I write clean and maintainable code, in compliance with W3C standards, WAI accessibility and SEO practices. I enjoy working as part of a team as well as on my own.

 In the past I’ve been working as a backend developer and as a QA engineer, and I keep learning about the latest trends in this fields when I have the chance.

work.summary: Frontend developer at SnT Classifieds Asia (Schibsted and Telenor Joint Venture), the joint venture of Schibsted Classified Media and Telenor Group for online classifieds in Asian emerging markets.
highlights: Maintenance and development of new features in the custom classifieds management platform (different sites in Bangladesh, Pakistan y Thailand).
Custom themes, banners and landing pages implementation for marketing campaigns, integrate different web analytics 3rd party tools in new features.
Web performance optimization and analysis.
Integrate new tools to improve frontend development workflow and reduce existing technical debt.
Prototype/redesign of ScamControl, a web administration panel to fight against fraud in the new messaging platform for SegundaMano.es
Development and maintenance in Notes, Internet/Intranet/Extranet and Web Applications environments. - Level 2 support to Customer Care centers.
Mentoring (PHP OOP, ExtJS, Git) to team members.
Migration of Visual SourceSafe repositories to Git, implantation of new bug-tracking system.
Maintenance and new features development in CE Customer Care portal.
RIA (Rich Internet Applications) and Single Page Applications development.
Customization and branding of WorldPay (electronic payments platform).
Test automation for all application modules.
Automated tests integration with existing bug-tracking systems (JIRA) and continuous integration (Jenkins).
Mentoring (Selenium, Maven, Java) to team members.
Development of RIA applications (Rich Internet Applications).
Collaboration with UX team to develop interactive prototypes.
Configuration of Continuous Integration environment to automate common Frontend tasks.
Mentoring (Javascript OOP, ExtJS) to team members.
Collaboration in platform requirements analysis and workload planning (Sprint Backlog, Estimation Meeting, Sprint Planning).
Manual and automatic tests execution against different components (and releases) for e-books aggregation/publication platform.
Reporting, tracking and reviewing bug reports.
REST services monitoring and logging in development and production environments.
Generate different QA reports: test-case execution results, current bug status by priority, trends...
Design, development and maintenance of custom web applications, development of APIs consumed from several platforms (web, Android).
Specialization in symfony framework, PHP5, JS frameworks, usability, accessibility and W3C standards.
Mentoring (PHP OOP, symfony) to team members.
Requirements gathering and specification, Cost Estimations, Functional Design and Analysis for web applications.
Design and development of custom web pages and web applications (more than 30 projects).
Specialization in symfony framework, PHP5, JS frameworks, usability, accessibility and W3C standards.
IT consultancy for external clients and mentoring (PHP OOP, symfony) to team members.
Design and development of custom web pages and web applications (more than 15 projects).
Specialization in symfony framework, PHP5, JS frameworks, usability, accessibility and W3C standards.
IT consultancy for external clients and mentoring (PHP OOP, symfony) to team members.
Refactor and standardization (according to W3C standards and internal style-guides) of 'Guia de Recursos Turístics i Patrimonials del Bages' web application (http://www.bagesturisme.net/).
Develop new features, test and fix existing ones, and develop product documentation (installation and user guides).
Improvements in usability, accessibility and design.

volunteer.summary: Leading online classified site in Bangladesh.
New 'light quotation & sales' tool based on current PO2 platform deployed years ago in Egypt. The main platform features are:
highlights: Quotation Light Process
Discount/Approval Process
Conversion to Sales Order
Connection to Several SAPs (Turkish SAP and Iberian SAP) o Web Tool without cost licenses

volunteer.summary:
This Consumer Electronics Solution is an innovative and simple product that enables both operators and device manufacturers to provide the users with an Always Connected experience with tablets and computers.

Is a End-to-End connectivity solution based on:
highlights: Supported by m2m managed connectivity (Jasper and Smart m2m)
Managed through the CE Portal developed by Telefónica
Built-in application to manage PAYG Bundles (Android and win 7&8)
Preloaded connectivity
Pay as you go solution
Pay per content

volunteer.summary:
A web-based platform that provides visualisation, monitoring and control through tools that are easy to handle and integrate into your systems.

We are able to provide the service using our proprietary platform, Smart m2m, or using one of our partners, Jasper Wireless, a privately held company that is a market leader in enabling platforms. The main functionalities are:
highlights: Control of all the SIM cards: status, price plan, limits, privileges, etc.
Troubleshooting tools.
Configuration of automation rules and alerts.
Real-time billing.
Set of reports.
Location based services.

volunteer.summary: An open source web application meant to help manage & create invoices in a simple, straightforward way.
highlights: Design and implementation of new features.
Software testing, i18n translations and bug fixing.
Misc contributions to the project: http://dev.siwapp.org/projects/siwapp/search?q=ablasco
